column4: a Facebook account called “Sim Salita” posted a message that there was a crocodile in the Sangker River.------On the afternoon of April 20
column6: the Rapid Response Team of the Battambang Provincial Police Office came forward to clarify that this was not a live crocodile
column7: but a dead one that the owner taken from a farm to collect meat and skin. Therefore
column8: the public should not be alarmed. ------AREY------*Battambang has ------previously had croc reports------ from the river.
